answers.answer: Hi,The causes of  abnormal taste sensations could be side effects of all the medications that you are taking and a hormonal imbalance that may have been caused by the pituitary tumour or sudden stopping of synthroid. Please do not worry. It is a common symptom after using so many medications. Please consult your doctor and discuss the symptom.  Hope this helps you. Take care and regards!

question: I'm not sure what its from. Sometimes it taste like blood. After I brush my teethBroken or knocked out toothDental care - adultDental x-raysDevelopment of baby teethDevelopment of permanent teethPlaque and tartar on teethTeethingTeething symptomsToothaches, It just comes back after a few minutes. I have GERD, and a number of medical problems.Pituitary tumor, although it is tiny.AorticAbdominal aortic aneurysmAortic aneurysmAortic angiographyAortic arch syndromeAortic dissectionAortic insufficiencyAortic rupture, chest x-rayAortic stenosisHypertrophic cardiomyopathyThoracic aortic aneurysm StenosisAortic stenosisBlocked tear ductCarotid stenosis, x-ray of the left arteryCarotid stenosis, x-ray of the right arteryHypertrophic cardiomyopathyMitral stenosisPulmonary valve stenosisPyloric stenosisRenal artery stenosisSpinal stenosisAsthmaDepressionUnder active Thyroidand a few more things.I'm on medicine for all of them. Except the tumor, obviously.I am a hypochondriac, and I do worry about everything lolWhat could this be? I just had blood tests a few months ago, and It said I do not have diabetes.Could my pituitary tumor all of a sudden just be producing hormones?  I don't understand..Could it also be from my sudden stop of synthroid?
title: Salty taste in my mouth
